title: Get the Heroine to Save Me at the End - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cautious Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Pregnancy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Tsundere
author: 水声
description:
When Ling Ye transmigrated into the final boss, it was already right before the end.

Facing the max leveled protagonist, all that awaited him was death!

At this critical moment, Ling Ye discovered a way out in the heroine!

Thus, he secretly contacted the heroine…

When the protagonist finally came out of seclusion at max level…

Ling Ye:  “Sorry about that.  She seems to be on my side, and she even wants to marry me…”

The protagonist blew his top:  “How did the woman that I chased after all this time to no avail end up becoming yours?”>
